mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS MEMBERNO, MEMBER_ID AS MEMBERID, MEMBER_PWD AS MEMBERPWD, AUTH_PROVIDER AS AUTHPROVIDER, NICKNAME AS MEMBERNICKNAME, GENDER AS MEMBERGENDER, BIRTHDATE AS BIRTHDATE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS DETAILADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_STATUS AS MEMBER_STATUS, DOG_YN AS DOGYN, MEMBER_PROFILE AS memberProfile FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD=#{memberPwd}
mapper.update: update member set NICKNAME=#{memberNickname}, GENDER=#{gender}, BIRTHDATE=#{birthdate}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, ADDRESS_DETAIL=#{detailAddress} where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select DOG_NO as dogNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, DOG_NAME as dogName, GENDER as gender, BREED as breed, DOG_SIZE as dogSize, NEUTRALIZATION_YN as neutralization_YN, VACCINATION_YN as vaccination_YN, BIRTHDATE as birthdate, DOG_PROFILE as dogProfile from dog where MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
